translations: n.（暴力，愤怒或政治冲突）一触即发；危险即将爆发的地点；【化学】闪点

sentences.sentence: The more serious flashpoints are outside the capital.
sentences.translation: 更加危险的动乱区在首都之外。
还有其他严重的潜在热点存在。

sentences.sentence: One of the big flashpoints on that day was Hackney, in north-east London.
sentences.translation: 伦敦东北部的哈克尼是当日一大焦点之一。
